C

Charge - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model
The class holds all the Credit / Debit information in a request
as well as the State.
The class is marked as Abstract so only its sub classes will be instantiated.
The Charge.hashCode() for this class uses the Charge ID.
Charge() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model.Charge
 
Charge(int, LocalDateTime, double, Account) - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model.Charge
 
ChargeFactory - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl
This class implements Factory design pattern for charge type creations.
Charges can be either Debit for withdraw or Credit for deposit
ChargeFactory() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl.ChargeFactory
 
code() - Method in enum il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.Event
 
Codec - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.api
Decodes a String representing a request into EventData
and EventData into a String representing a response.
The fields in the string are separated by comma and expected in the following order:
REQUEST_ID,DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM,COMMAND,ACCOUNT,AMOUNT
Where:
REQUEST_ID - unique id for the request (in account level)
COMMAND - event ID according to the ordinal of each member of Event
ACCOUNT - account id
AMOUNT - (signed) double
This class uses API as the keys for each field.
Codec() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.api.Codec
 
commit(Account, double) - Static method in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl.AccountHelper

CommitHandler - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler
Implementation of commit on a reserved Debit charge.
The amount is removed from the Account's reserved balance.
